'''Treasure''' may refer to:
* {{EnvLink|Buried treasure}}, a natural structure consisting of a chest containing valuable loot that generates underground
* {{EnvSprite|buried-treasure}} [[Shipwreck#Loot|Treasure chest]], a chest found in the upper section of the stern of shipwrecks containing random valuable loot
* {{ItemSprite|Bow}} {{ItemSprite|Enchanted Book}} {{ItemSprite|Fishing Rod}} {{ItemSprite|Name Tag}} {{ItemSprite|Nautilus Shell}} {{ItemSprite|Saddle}} "Treasure" items obtained from [[Fishing#Junk and treasures|fishing]]
* {{ItemLink|Buried Treasure Map}}, also known as a "treasure map", used to locate buried treasure
* [[Treasure enchantment]], special enchantments that cannot be obtained with an enchantment table
* Treasure Room, one of the four variants of a {{EnvLink|Bastion Remnant}}
